content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: green_stained_glass_pane
inventory=[{"type": "infested_chiseled_stone_bricks", "quantity": 40, "index": 10}, {"type": "music_disc_pigstep", "quantity": 1, "index": 27}, {"type": "green_stained_glass", "quantity": 6, "index": 33}, {"type": "mushroom_stew", "quantity": 1, "index": 35}, {"type": "chorus_fruit", "quantity": 39, "index": 39}]
thought: To craft a green_stained_glass_pane, I need to first place 6 green_stained_glass in the crafting grid. I will start by moving the green_stained_glass from slot 33 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 33 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Ok
